GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
nfsd: eliminate the NFSD_FILE_BREAK_* flags

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 755f49dd4191e1d100a2ce8d356498403280f010, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 65294c1f2c5e72b15b76e16c8c8cfd9359fc9f6f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:
nfsd: eliminate the NFSD_FILE_BREAK_* flags

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 755f49dd4191e1d100a2ce8d356498403280f010, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 65294c1f2c5e72b15b76e16c8c8cfd9359fc9f6f. For more details please see the references link.
